column4: So after reading the man pages I'm still not clear on what the difference between 'sudo apt-get clean' and 'sudo apt-get autoclean' is. Which should I use?
Are there some standard steps an Ubuntu user can take to keep the installation clean? Such things like 'sudo apt-get autoclean'
Autoclean? That's all I need to periodically do?
I always use sudo apt-get --purge autoclean/remove
What's the splash screen compared to the login screen?
GDM themes are login screen themes, yeah?
So if I'm on www.gnome-look.org and I want a new login screen, I want to look at GDM Themes, right?
Nothing, I just want a new login screen
